TRANSCRIBE_ON_MESSAGE_FOR_CONTACTS: From now on, all audios will be automatically transcribed.
TRANSCRIBE_OFF_MESSAGE_FOR_CONTACTS: From now on, audio messages will no longer be transcribed.
TRANSCRIBE_PRIVATE_MESSAGE_FOR_CONTACTS: From now on, audio messages will no longer be transcribed here.
TRANSCRIBE_SAME_MODE: This chat already had this mode enabled previously, it will continue to work the same way!
TRANSCRIPTION_NOT_AVAILABLE: Error trying to connect to transcription engine
TEMPLATE_EMAIL_WHATSAPP_DISCONNECTED_DES: Ozer, your audio message to text conversion service, has lost connection with WhatsApp.
To reconnect Ozer with WhatsApp, you can go to https://www.ozer.bot, log in and follow the instructions.
If you have any questions, you can reply to this email.
TEMPLATE_EMAIL_NEW_USER_DESCRIPTION: Thanks for joining Ozer. From now on, WhatsApp audio messages will be automatically converted to text. To change your settings, you can go to https://www.ozer.bot and login.
